name: EMG1
placement_scheme: near the elbow crease on the inner forearm

name: EMG2
placement_scheme: dorsal side of the forearm, about halfway between the elbow and the wrist

name: EMG3
placement_scheme: upper forearm, about one-third of the way down from the elbow, on the lateral side

name: EMG4
placement_scheme: Locate the midpoint of the inner forearm

name: EMG5
placement_scheme: above the wrist on the inner forearm

name: EMG6
placement_scheme: Over the fleshy area at the base of the thumb
